member.name: DISCARDCACHE
member.summary: Specifies what to do with caches that are to be discarded from memory if their dirty bit has been set.

member.name: DISCARDCACHE.DISCARDCACHE_SAVEIFDIRTY
member.summary: The cache is to be saved to disk.

member.name: DISCARDCACHE.DISCARDCACHE_NOSAVE
member.summary: The cache can be discarded without saving it.
